data.actual_result: The icons overlap. It looks like one icon is budding from the other.
data.expected_result: There should be 2 server icons side by side.
data.short_description: People who are your friends and with whom you share only two servers (one of which has default icon) with show an overlapped mutual server image in the mutual servers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server. - Do not change it's icon i.e. let it's icon be the default one. - Invite a friend with whom you share just one common server. - Open the friends tab. - Look at the mutual servers with the person in the friends tab.
